item.title: What is going on, exactly?
item.author: ruggierogiuseppe96@gmail.com (Giuseppe Ruggiero)
item.description: What is this blog? That’s a fair question, and to be honest I’m not exactly sure either, but I felt the urge to write something down for a while and so this is an outlet for that, I guess.
